alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:55AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick, southeastern Harvey and northwestern Butler Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valley Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, El Dorado, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Sedgwick, Towanda, Benton, Whitewater, Kechi, Potwin, El Dorado Airport, El Dorado Lake and El Dorado State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 13 and 26. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 60 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
